interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: Mr. Pristine
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.5 x 2.36 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801825', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'}
Review Text: I ordered this for my husband as he’s quite the beard connoisseur, from shampoos and conditioners to oils and balms. He was highly pleased with this shampoo and conditioner. He likes the soft minty scent of both and enjoyed that they weren’t too strong in smell. The shampoo lathered well and to his expectations, while the conditioner helped soft the course hairs. Overall a fantastic Amazon find!
Review Title: Softly mint scented beard perfection!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day
SIKEMAY
{'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676838', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
In my photo, the left side has 2 applications of peacock mascara, the right side has none at all, the difference in length is dramatic. This mascara glides on smoothly and clump free... HOWEVER, it’s stringy if that makes since, like the tiny fibers in it are extremely noticeable. (I attached a photo where even the wand itself is stringy.) The mascara doesn’t dry in a timely manner either. Five minutes after applying the mascara and it’s still not dry. I really wanted to love this mascara for the dramatic length it adds, however the quality is not what I expected.
Dramatic length. Long drying time. Stringy mess.
[Marshique] Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum 0.25 Fl Oz - Oil Free Formula Essence Conditioner for Extension & Perm Treatment Care
Marshique
{'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 1.54 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0000'}
The serum seems nice and was easy to apply, however there were no instructions included in the box, the box itself had no English language. I really wanted to try this product, however I can’t give you an honest review if it works because I don’t know if the product should be applied once or twice a day, before makeup or at night. Directions need to be added to the product for an honest review.
No instructions on how to use the product.
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
{'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
This will actually be my third gel kit, as the others have failed to meet my expectations. This kit is about as close as you get to salon quality. The light worked well and cured the gel polish as expected. The instructions were top notch, giving you precise directions on exactly what to do. This particular kit comes with most the items you need. The items not included are - nail file, buffer, and most importantly the actual gel color. I wasn’t able to test their polish out as I didn’t realize this didn’t come with a color. However I have other gel brands and the red I chose worked with this set. I followed the instructions using all the supplies from the kit except the color and I’m very pleased with the result. I would recommend this over other brands offered at your local general stores.
Great instructions, don’t forget to buy the gel color.
Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
Azun
{'Brand': 'Azun', 'Material': 'Mesh', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '13 x 11 x 1 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '13 x 11 x 1 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Great spa like bath pillow! The pillow is plush and thick, unlike our last pillow. The material is fabric and easy to wash in the washer, so much better than our last plastic/vinyl covered tub pillow that was cold to the touch. The suction is much better and stronger on this pillow, with 6 large suction cups. The pillow also has a hanger on it for drying purposes but tucks away when in use. Hands down a great bath pillow that’s very spa like!
My favorite spa like tub pillow!
Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz.
Mr. Pristine
{'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'}
I ordered this for my husband as he’s quite the beard connoisseur, from shampoos and conditioners to oils and balms. He was highly pleased with this shampoo and conditioner. He likes the soft minty scent of both and enjoyed that they weren’t too strong in smell. The shampoo lathered well and to his expectations, while the conditioner helped soft the course hairs. Overall a fantastic Amazon find!
Softly mint scented beard perfection!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to prioritize high-impact cosmetic items, especially for eyelash and nail care, while showing a growing interest in quality grooming products. Their recent purchase of a beard conditioner reflects a focus on effective grooming solutions that emphasize scent and softness, aligning with their preference for home spa and self-care accessories.

- **Quality Expectations**: The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality products. Their latest review highlighted satisfaction with the performance and scent of a grooming product, reinforcing their expectation for detailed instructions that enhance product evaluation.

- **Experience Sensitivity**: The user is sensitive to texture and usability, consistently seeking straightforward application experiences across all purchased products, particularly in grooming categories. This preference aligns with their overarching goal of enhanced satisfaction through user-friendly designs.

- **Visual Feedback**: The user values visual evidence of product effectiveness and prefers brands that promote visual sharing of experiences, aiding in their assessment of diverse products.

- **Rating Trends**: The user typically provides balanced, critical reviews, often leaning toward average ratings. However, their recent positive experience with a grooming product indicates a willingness to express high satisfaction when quality and usability are met.

In summary, the user enjoys effective enhancement products and reliable grooming accessories, maintaining a discerning approach to quality and user experience across various categories while expanding their grooming repertoire.
